intro: Bonjour! I'm a passionate Full Stack Web Developer living in Toulouse. You can find here some of my experience and skills as well as a form to contact me. I am looking forward to meet you!

edux.title: Institut Supérieur de l'Aéronautique et de l'Espace, Toulouse
edux.text:
Master's degree in Aerospace, Aeronautical and Space Engineering
2 years at ENSICA - 1 year at SUPAERO

edux.title: Airbus Defence and Space, Toulouse
edux.text:
Senior Software Architect
Satellite Simulator Web GUI - React, Typescript, Golang, ZeroMQ, Protobuf

edux.title: Atos (for the French Navy), Toulon
edux.text:
Software Developer
Tactical Data Link - Java, Spring, Ant
